coowner_choosing_description: Choose a player to assign as co-owner
error_getting_vehicle: An error occurred while retrieving the vehicle with VIN: %s for %s
added_you_as_vehicle_coowner: %s %s added you as a co-owner of vehicle %s with plate %s

removed_a_vehicle_coowner: You removed the co-owner of vehicle %s with plate %s

coowner_same: You cannot change the co-owner to the same one!
existing_coowner: This vehicle already has a co-owner assigned
no_bank_money: You don’t have enough money in the bank!
